descript.abstract: Provider Description: Defines the ownership category of the water system consisting of: Federal: owned by federal government; Mixed (Public/Private): owned by both private owner and public (local, state, federal); Private: owned by a private owner; Local: owned by a municipality; State Government: owned by the State Water Source Description: Code showing the primary source of water: GW: groundwater; GWP: groundwater purchased; SW: surface water; SWP: surface water purchased; GU: groundwater under influence of surface water; GUP: purchased ground water under influence of surface water sourceData Source: lists the origin of the displayed system area. MDE: Internal files; Water System: file provided by system; County GIS: County provide GIS layers; County W&S: Water & Sewer Plan Maps; SDWIS: information from State database
descript.purpose: A polygon feature class to represent the the Community water System service areas that provide public water across Maryland.

idinfo.useconst: Data is subject to change. Information displayed from these files will be updated and modified as new information is received from water systems.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
